alert.note: Alert for Clear Creek (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 8:44PM MDT until August 07 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Colorado, including the following counties, Clear Creek and Gilpin. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 844 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Idaho Springs, Central City, Black Hawk, Aspen Springs, Dumont and Russell Gulch.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
